Name: Princess the Cat
Personality: No real personality—just present occasionally. Julie renamed.

Name: Bonnie Coon
Personality: Aloof but friendly. Sidekick—someone Peter Rabbit talks to.

Name: Old Granny Fox
Personality: Sly, vengeful, always on Reddy's case—always mad at him for messing up. In "Old Man Coyote", Granny Fox is competing with Old Man Coyote because she thinks she's smarter/wants to be seen as smarter. Has a forceful personality—not colorful, but sharp, clever, almost bullying.

Name: Old Mrs. Toad
Personality: One story: she wanted more adventure but got herself in trouble. Provides advice to Dani, but is also insecure about her appearance (thinks Dani is referring to her when Dani talks about being ugly and boring). Wise, but not enlightened—level-headed but has flaws.

Name: Paddy Beaver
Personality: Easygoing, friendly, shrewder than he looks.

Name: Peter Rabbit
Personality: The main character in all Burgess books. Peter is like the kid reading the story: very curious, always does the things that you would want him to do. Curious to a fault. Confidence level: average — he's not bold so much as he just doesn't think ahead.

Name: Reddy Fox
Personality: Not as vicious as Granny. Definitely a threat. Doesn't know tricks like Granny does, so he makes a lot of mistakes. Making mistakes is a big part of his personality: over-confident. Disgruntled and ashamed when she yells at him—doesn't like her because of that. Does respect that she knows more than he does. (Maybe something brazen but slightly shabby/doesn't fit well? Hobo-ish clothing?)
